comment: The sum of the inverse squares is ` _pi ^ 2 / 6 ` . This is commonly known as the Basel problem, with the first known proof attributed to Euler. See ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basel_problem . This particular proof approach is due to Cauchy (1821). This is Metamath 100 proof #14. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Jul-2014.)
